00185 inline void 
00186 InterfaceRequestData::reset() {
00187    clientType = "";
00188    clientTypeSet = false;
00189    clientTypeOptions = "";
00190    clientTypeOptionsSet = false;
00191    clientLang = LangTypes::english;
00192    stringtClientLang = StringTable::ENGLISH;
00193    clientSetting = NULL;
00194    backupUser = false;
00195    setClientVersion( 0, 0, 0 );
00196    clientVSet = false;
00197    wayfinderType = MAX_BYTE;
00198    wayfinderTypeSet = false;
00199    urmask = UserEnums::URType( UserEnums::TSG_MASK, UserEnums::UR_WF );
00200    ipnport = IPnPort( 0, 0 );
00201    externalAuth = "";
00202    hwKeys.clear();
00203    hwKey.setLicence( "" );
00204 }

00206 inline 
00207 void InterfaceRequestData::setClientVersion(
00208    uint32 major, uint32 minor, uint32 mini )
00209 {
00210    clientMajorV = major;
00211    clientMinorV = minor;
00212    clientMiniV  = mini;
00213    clientV[ 0 ] = clientMajorV;
00214    clientV[ 1 ] = clientMinorV;
00215    clientV[ 2 ] = clientMiniV;
00216    clientVSet = true;
00217 }
